question:
Some parents buy their children a large number of toys to play with.
What are the advantages and disadvantages for the child of having a large number of toys?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience. Write at least 250 words.
text: Every child fond of toys during his early childhood. These toys, play an important role in the  growth of  a child. Therefore, many parents buy penalty of this kind of stuff to for their kids. Playing with toys helps the ones for overall development, but spending large time with these leads to cut off from the society. Thus, it both have pros and cons to play with toys all times for the children. This essay will discuss both in details.

On the one hand,  toys make the learning effective in early childhood. Therefore, it is a crucial factor for the early mental growth of kid. Moreover, pupil easily captured the learning through these play articles. For instance, according to a recent survey, it has been seen that, child who taught through toys easily learnt the things as compared to those who taught using traditional methods of learning. Hence, the  toys  are the effective learning tool for the children. In addition to this, play with active toys help the infant to grow both physical and mental health.

On the other hand, it has been seen that spending excessive time with toys made the pupils isolated from the socialisation. Therefore, they feel awkward to interact socially. For example, a infant who spends a lot of time with toys, have lack of communication with other community members. Therefore,  one can feel hesitate to express themselves with others.
To conclude, the  toys play an important role in the development of children, but playing a lot of time with their toys are isolated from the society due to lack of communication.,
